articles.title: New Brunswick reports 16 new COVID-19 cases and death of person in their 70s
articles.description: FREDERICTON - New Brunswick is reporting 16 new cases of COVID-19 today and another death related to the virus.
articles.content:
FREDERICTON - New Brunswick is reporting 16 new cases of COVID-19 today and another death related to the virus.
